Introduction

Samuel (also known as Kim Samuel & previously as Punch) is a Korean-American singer. He was known for becoming a potential member of SEVENTEEN, one-half of the former duo 1PUNCH, and for participating in Produce 101 Season 2 where he placed 18th in the finale.

He made his solo debut on August 2, 2017, with the mini album 'Sixteen'.

Fun facts
